title: What problems can be solved with technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think with the help of technology we can solve every problem. But only 1 problem this is not solved by technology and that is Husband Wife problem…😀😀😆 when technology resolved this problem then we can say technology solved all problem. See if you are student you can gain knowledge with technology, if you are a job seeker then you can earn money with technology, if you are finding entertainment then you can watch with technology , lf you have any problem in life then you can ask with technology, if you want to play games then you can play with technology, if you are searching for anything then you can find that product/place with the help of technology. Technology is very very useful in our day to day life if you are used it by proper way. Some people come here for gain knowledge or learn new thing and some people are come here for do timepass. So how to use of technology it's your choice but technology resolved as many problem as. Use technology by proper ways….😊
